abstract: The renowned investor Warren E. Buffett said he sees buying opportunities in the United States for his company, Berkshire Hathaway, as prices decline and competition from rival bidders decreases.
lead_paragraph: The renowned investor Warren E. Buffett said he sees buying opportunities in the United States for his company, Berkshire Hathaway, as prices decline and competition from rival bidders decreases.

headline.main: Buffett Sees Buying Opportunities in U.S.
